name: Password Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: What word goes best with cat?
questions.explanation:
meow.

	A cat meows which is why the two words go together. Big cats like lions roar but I did not ask about big cats.

questions.text: What word goes best with table?
questions.explanation:
eat.

	All the words are action words (or verbs). However, the only one you can do at a table is eat.

questions.text: What word goes best with piano?
questions.explanation:
music.

	A piano makes music. You could eat ice cream while sitting at a piano, but it does not really go with piano.

questions.text: What word goes best with pretend?
questions.explanation:
mermaid.

	A mermaid is pretend the other things are all real. One famous mermaid is Ariel from "The Little Mermaid".

questions.text: What word goes best with mouse?
questions.explanation:
cheese.

	A mouse eats cheese. If I said pelican then the answer would have been fish.

questions.text: What word goes best with peaches?
questions.explanation:
apples.

	Both apples and peaches are fruit. Broccoli is a vegetable, hamburger is a meat and bread is a grain.

questions.text: What word goes best with car?
questions.explanation:
mechanic.

	A mechanic fixes cars. A blacksmith creates items from metal. A dentist takes care of your teeth and gums. A lawyer deals with the law.

questions.text: What word goes best with paper?
questions.explanation:
pencil.

	You can write with a pencil on a piece of paper. A stirrup is what a horse rider puts his foot in when riding a horse.

questions.text: What word goes best with ice?
questions.explanation:
cold.

	Ice is very cold. You make ice by freezing water.

questions.text: What word goes best with pumpkin?
questions.explanation:
Halloween.

	On Halloween many people like to carve pumpkins and put candles in them to make jack-o-lanterns. All four choices are holidays in the United States, although Halloween is a holiday that is not a federal holiday which means businesses and schools do not close for it.
